page.title: 04THE WHITEHAWK REDEVELOPMENT
page.content: We live in Whitehawk, an estate built in the 1930s.It is being redeveloped. These are the results of an interveiw with Mr. Danes, an architect for the town in charge of the work: The new houses will last{10 years longer than the old ones. The new houses cost{Â£30,000}each. The project has cost{Â£25,000,000}and at 1985 prices the whole finished project will have cost{Â£55,000,000}and{5836} people will have been rehoused. The project started in{1976}and will be completed in{1990/1.}The new houses are insulated in the windows, the front door,the walls and the roof. In the new old peoples home there are fire doors and alarms. The amenities they will be building are: Three tennis courts,a 5 a-side football area & a landscaped park.
